title: Oversized 2 Br 2 Bath Condo Rental! Immaculately Kept Property! PICS!!
posting_body: ['IMPORTANT -', 'Write your real email address into your inquiry.', 'Only inquiries that include this will be responded to.', 'Spacious 2 br 2 bath condo rental available in Methuen.', '-Mostly owner-occupied condo property!', '-Central heat and A/C!', '-Impeccable amenities!', 'Available End-Aug.', 'Sep 1st', 'is the', 'latest', 'it can be held for.', '"Oversized condo rental available in beautifully maintained property.', "This mostly owner-occupied property features impeccable amenities, such as it's pristine pool and gym.", 'The condo available has been owner-occupied since they bought it.', 'The condo is very spacious with a beautiful kitchen and an exclusive porch.', 'Central heat and A/C!', 'Right by Rt. 93 and tax free New Hampshire!', 'This one won\'t last long!"', 'FEATURES:', '-Spacious Unit', '-2 Full Baths', '-Central A/C', '-Wall-to-Wall Carpeting', '-Dining Room Space with Hardwood Flooring', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Gas Stove', '-Garbage Disposal', '-Walk-in Closet', '-Exclusive Porch', '-Gym', '-Pristine Pool', '-Close to Rt. 93 and Tax Free New Hampshire', 'PROPERTY TYPE:', 'Condo Community', 'FLOOR:', '2nd', 'HEAT:', 'Gas Heat', 'WASHER and DRYER OPTION:', 'In-Unit', 'PARKING:', 'Two Off-Street Parking Spots', 'PET POLICY:', 'Cat and Small Dog Negotiable', '$2250 a Month.', 'To Rent:', 'First + Last + Half Fee.', 'Qualifications:', 'Good credit', 'and a minimum gross household income of', '$81K', '.', 'Notes:', 'No smoking.', 'Located in Methuen.', "Methuen's surrounding communities are Andover, North Andover, Dracut, Lawrence, and Haverhill.", 'MA - Mass - Massachusetts.', '“A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.”', '- Elbert Hubbard', 'IMPORTANT -', 'Write your real email address into your inquiry.', 'Only inquiries that include this will be responded to.']
